features.1: Separated software releases by use case to improve maintainability.
features.2: Updated SGI calculation to remove negative readings
features.3: Added powered by Skroot logo on boot screen.

bugfixes.1: Fixed exports to display correct modified date on Windows.
bugfixes.2: Updated analyzed file creation to correctly align timestamps with scan values.
bugfixes.3: Fixed fresh install to select the correct boot logo.

bugfixes.1: Fixed roller bottle algorithm to correctly record good sweeps only.
bugfixes.2: Fixed an issue causing bad sweeps to be recorded in some cases.

features.1: Initial release with unified application structure.
